pkgmetadata.longdescription: Metabolite Set Enrichment Analysis for Loadings // Computing metabolite set enrichment analysis (MSEA) (Yamamoto, H. et al. (2014) doi:10.1186/1471-2105-15-51), single sample enrichment analysis (SSEA) (Yamamoto, H. (2023) doi:10.51094/jxiv.262) and over-representation analysis (ORA) that accounts for undetected metabolites (Yamamoto, H. (2024) doi:10.51094/jxiv.954).
